item.title: Flytipping Hesters Way library, 11th February
item.description:
Flytipped carpets and cushions at the side of Hesters Way library. (To the left of the library if youâ€™re facing the entrance on Edinburgh Place). Please can this be cleared?

item.title: The drain is blocked problem, 11th February
item.description:

Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Group of 6 potholes in middle of road. Unavoidable, 11th February
item.description:
Monson Avenue directly outside the exit to the NCP Carpark. Causing damage to vehicles alloys when leaving the car park. This is a large group of potholes in varying depths and lengths. This is unavoidable to vehicles leaving the NCP car park and are deep enough to cause damage to vehicles alloys.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 22, Northfield Passage, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
